Desc.eng: Trying to outsmart yourself is such a pointless struggle. Submit to this blade and die.
Do I really see multiple versions of the same person?
Me and myself are having a fatal misunderstanding. Ehhehe.
Kill him, before the Wretched One sends more!
Why not kill all of us? That would be a fitting end to our pathetic lives!
Killing all of you seems like the only sensible solution.
Alright, I'll help, but I want an explanation.
I have more important killing to do. Goodbye.
